jabber.Stream

type
class
subclasses
jabber.client.Stream
available in
neko, js, flash, php, node
Abstract base for XMPP streams to and from another entity.

Static Variables

defaultMaxBufSize : Int

defaultPacketIdLength : Int

Instance Variables

bufSize(default,null) : Int

cnx(default,setConnection) : jabber.stream.Connection

collectors : Array<jabber.stream.PacketCollector>

dataFilters(default,null) : Array<jabber.stream.TDataFilter>

dataInterceptors(default,null) : Array<jabber.stream.TDataInterceptor>

features(default,null) : jabber._Stream.StreamFeatures

id(default,null) : String

jid(default,setJID) : JID

lang(default,null) : String

maxBufSize : Int

server(default,null) : jabber._Stream.Server

status : jabber.stream.Status

Instance Methods

addCollector(c : jabber.stream.PacketCollector) : Bool

Adds a XMPP packet collector to this stream and starts the timeout if not null.

addIDCollector(id : String, handler : Dynamic -> Void) : jabber.stream.PacketCollector

Adds an packet collector which filters XMPP packets by ids. These collectors get processed before any other.

addInterceptor(i : jabber.stream.TPacketInterceptor) : Bool

close(?disconnect : Bool) : Void

Closes the XMPP stream.
Passed argument indicates if the data connection to the server should also get disconnected.

collect(filters : Iterable<xmpp.PacketFilter>, handler : Dynamic -> Void, ?permanent : Bool) : jabber.stream.PacketCollector

Creates, adds and returns a XMPP packet collector.

handleData(bytes : haxe.io.Bytes) : Bool

handlePacket(p : xmpp.Packet) : Bool

Handles incoming XMPP packets.
Returns true if the packet got handled.

handleString(t : String) : Bool

handleXml(x : Xml) : Array<xmpp.Packet>

Inject incoming XML data.
Returns array of handled XMPP packets.

interceptPacket(p : xmpp.Packet) : xmpp.Packet

Runs the XMPP packet interceptor on the given packet.

nextID() : String

Get the next unique id for a XMPP packet.

dynamic onClose(?error : String) : Void

dynamic onOpen() : Void

open(jid : JID) : Void

Open the XMPP stream.

removeCollector(c : jabber.stream.PacketCollector) : Bool

removeInterceptor(i : jabber.stream.TPacketInterceptor) : Bool

sendBytes(bytes : haxe.io.Bytes) : haxe.io.Bytes

sendData(t : String) : String

Send raw string.

sendIQ(iq : xmpp.IQ, ?handler : xmpp.IQ -> Void) : xmpp.IQ

Send an IQ packet and forwards the response to the given handler function.

sendMessage(to : String, body : String, ?subject : String, ?type : xmpp.MessageType, ?thread : String, ?from : String) : xmpp.Message

Send a message packet (default type is 'chat').

sendPacket<T>(p : T, ?intercept : Bool) : T

Intercept/Send/Return XMPP packet.

sendPresence(?show : xmpp.PresenceShow, ?status : String, ?priority : Int, ?type : xmpp.PresenceType) : xmpp.Presence

Send a presence packet.
